item.title: Download 510k PEACH 1.0.2
item.description: PEACH 510k is a next-generation polyphonic MIDI plugin designed to create rhythmically-bending, variable polyphonic arpeggiator sequences in digital audio workstations (DAWs). Unlike traditional arpeggiators that follow fixed up/down cycle patterns, PEACH allows each lane of the arpeggiator to run at an independent step length. This feature turns simple chords into complex, variable polyphonic patterns, full of rhythm and variation. Key Features Polymetric Lanes — Each lane (Gate,...
